attributes.action: Allow greater power of scrutiny of government and non-government organisations by the citizens of this county.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to pass legislation that will give more power to the freedom of information act. This new power is to be supported and protected by the new supreme court when it is created. Citizens should have better access to public information and should be able to request government investigations into certain areas and organisations not run by the government with the consent of the supreme court.
